summary: This mod was made to go along with body mod nude versions. It adds lore friendly equipable undergarments that are worn under the armor/clothing (vanilla only for now) of the player and NPC's. The mod was created to avoid all the naked enemies after you take their armor/clothing while using body mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=5][b][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49555-1-1407745084.jpg[/img]
[i][size=3][color=#ff00ff]by:[/color] blackshark64[/size][/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Verdana][u]

[/u][u]
[/u][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][size=5][color=#ff00ff][b]MAJOR UPDATE!!![/b][/color][/size][/font][/font][/font]

[font=Verdana][font=Verdana][size=3]Added support for Legendary Edition or those with all DLC (thanks to [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4423783-mrdavoren/]mrdavoren[/url])

Added a patch forÂ [font=Verdana][font=Verdana][size=3]Hothtrooper44[/size][/font][/font] Immersive Armors mod[/size][/font][u]
[/u][/font]
[/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][size=5][color=#ff00ff][b]What does it do?[/b][/color][/size][/font][font=Verdana]
[/font][/center][font=Verdana][size=3]This mod was made to go along with body mod nude versions. It adds lore friendly equipable undergarments that are worn under the armor/clothing of the player and NPC's. The mod was created to avoid all the naked enemies after you take their armor/clothing while using nude version body mods. So if you want the ability to be naked, but still want the underwear option in an immersive way this mod is for you. Six varieties of undergarments have been added which include: leather, dark leather, blue knit, green knit, white satin, and black satin.[/size][/font][font=Verdana]

[size=3][center][color=#ff00ff][size=5][b]Requirements?[/b][/size][/color][/center]This mod requires a compatible nude female and male body mod. The supported mods are listed in the supported section.

[color=#ff00ff]***[/color]It is suggested you begin a new save for this mod to work best. This mod will not apply to any NPC you have visited previously in your current save.[color=#ff00ff]***[/color]
[center][size=5]
[/size][b][size=3][color=#ff00ff][size=5][b]What does version 1.1 do verses 1.0?[/b][/size][/color][/size][/b][/center][b][size=3]It should fix the known clipping issues.[/size] It fixes the download so they all can be installed with mod manager now. It uses less meshes in favor of texture sets. Many more male and female body options have been added in the main file and in the downloads section.
[/b][center][size=5][b]
[color=#ff00ff]Why use this female model for the undergarments in the mod?[/color][/b][/size][/center]The layered bikini was converted the most of the what I could find so it was chosen for the sake of greater compatibility.[color=#ff00ff][b]
[/b][/color][center][color=#ff00ff][b][size=5]How do I install this?[/size][/b][/color][/center]Download the file from nexus with mod manager or using manual method and extract using 7zip into your Skyrim directory or using mod manager auto install.
[b]
[/b][center][b][color=#ff00ff][size=5]Body mods that are in the original install?[/size][/color][/b][/center]The original install comes with CBBE for females and FavoredSoul for males. It also comes with the CBBE or CBBE TBBP bodyslide. If you use the bodyslide remember that you only need one of the two options. If you do not use these be sure to download the female and/or male version you are using and replace the meshes manually or with mod manager.[color=#ff00ff][size=5][b]

[/b][/size][/color][center][color=#ff00ff][size=5][b]Female body mods that are supported?[/b][/size][/color]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49555-4-1408167533.jpg[/img]
CBBE (regular + bodyslide)
CBBE TBBP (bodyslide)
UNP
UNPB
UNPB-BBP
UNPB-BBP-x
4uDIK's[/center][/size][/font]
[center][b][color=#ff00ff][size=5]Male body mods are that supported? [/size][/color][/b][/center][font=Verdana][size=3][center][color=#d5a6bd][b][size=4][size=3](shows clipping on non flaccid versions[/size][/size][/b][/color][color=#d5a6bd][b][size=4][size=3], suggest SOS for those who use errect)[/size][/size][/b][/color]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49555-2-1408167642.jpg[/img]
Sundracon
FavoredSoul
SOS Light (regular non-musclular)
4uDIK's[/center][b]
[/b][center][size=5][b][color=#ff00ff]Does this mod play nice with other mods?[/color][/b][/size][/center]This mod edits the armor addons section and outfit lists. Most mods never touch the armor addons area so it plays nice on that front. The outfit lists are usually not modified, but instead they just add more. Thus it should play nice all around so long as you make a new save and have it toward the end of the load order.

If you are playing with a non supported armor/clothing mod it's no big deal so long as you just don't wear undergarments while using that armor/clothing. As long as the non supported mod uses it's own outfit list instead of random level lists that are already integrated into vanilla outfit lists no underwear will be added to the NPC. The only reason it clips with unsupported mod chest piece armor/clothing is because they haven't been set to hide slot 52. (Does not work with SOS full version - must use light)
[center][b][size=4]
[color=#ff00ff][size=5]Credit and special thanks to:[/size][/color][/size][/b]
[color=#d5a6bd]Bethesda[/color] - Skyrim
[color=#d5a6bd]Caliente[/color] - CBBE
[color=#d5a6bd]dimon99[/color] - UNP
[color=#d5a6bd]Mr.Troublemaker[/color] - UNPB
[color=#d5a6bd]4uDIK1 [/color]- 4uDIK
[color=#d5a6bd]stuffed_bunny/ChronoTrigger77/ousnius[/color] - CBBE Slider + CBBE TBBP Slider for the Layered Bikini
[color=#d5a6bd]anano[/color] - Layered Bikini[/center]
[/size][/font][font=Verdana]
[/font]
author: blackshark64
